instructions.hero.title: Instructions To Use POS
instructions.hero.subtitle: Run your store effortlessly with EzyMart POS — no extra work, just smart solutions. And don't worry, we've always got your back with reliable support whenever you need it.
instructions.guidance.title: Guidance to Start Learning Process
instructions.guidance.subtitle: EzyMart helps small and mid-level business owners and customers in Sri Lanka. We make it easy to manage shops and find products nearby.
instructions.guidance.instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.guidance.instructions.conte: First, Read titles and find the video that you want to watch. Then watch the video. If there any issue feel free to contact us.
instructions.guidance.features.stepBySte: Easy to follow instructions for every feature
instructions.guidance.features.videoTuto: Watch detailed video guides for visual learning
instructions.guidance.features.community: Join our community for tips and best practices
instructions.guidance.features.helpCente: Get help whenever you need it from our experts
instructions.roadmap.title: Our Guidance For You
instructions.roadmap.subtitle: Follow our comprehensive step-by-step guide to master your EzyMart POS system
instructions.roadmap.steps.login.title: How to login
instructions.roadmap.steps.login.descrip: It's very simple, you just need to open the software in the desk and enter your username and password then press enter.
instructions.roadmap.steps.sell.title: How to Sell products
instructions.roadmap.steps.sell.descript: Learn how to process sales, scan barcodes, and manage transactions efficiently with our intuitive POS interface.
instructions.roadmap.steps.inventory.des: Track your inventory levels, set up low stock alerts, and manage your products with ease using our advanced system.
instructions.roadmap.steps.settings.desc: Configure your POS system settings, customize receipts, manage tax settings, and set up payment methods.
instructions.roadmap.steps.support.title: Getting Support
instructions.roadmap.steps.support.descr: Access our comprehensive help center, contact support, and join our community for ongoing assistance and tips.
instructions.roadmap.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
instructions.roadmap.cta.subtitle: Follow our step-by-step guide and start managing your business more efficiently today.

business.whyPos.badge: Exclusively For Sri Lankan Business Owners
business.whyPos.title: Why EzyMart POS?
business.whyPos.subtitle: Unlike generic solutions, EzyMart POS is specifically crafted for shop owners who value simplicity and efficiency. Experience business management that's not just easier—it's uniquely tailored to how you work.
business.whyPos.features.noCost.title: No Initial Cost
business.whyPos.features.noCost.subtitle: We value user experience before exactly be our customer.
business.whyPos.features.noCost.descript: Start using EzyMart POS with zero cost — After 1 month you can deside this is sutiabel for your business or not. If, Yes then you deside to work with us.
business.whyPos.features.simplicity.subt: We believe good service is everything.
business.whyPos.features.simplicity.desc: We have 24/7 hotline. In case any issue and we provide after services , updates , repairing etc.For run you business without having any issue.
business.whyPos.features.support.title: All In one application
business.whyPos.features.support.subtitl: You can get one system and manage everything in your business.
business.whyPos.features.support.descrip: You also now much better have one system do everything rather than having many systems & many payment.
business.whyPos.socialProof.quote: After trying 3 different POS systems, EzyMart is the only one that truly understands what small retailers need. It's like it was made specifically for my business.
business.whyPos.socialProof.author: — Sarah T., Boutique Owner
business.whyPos.cta.subtitle: Join the community of shop owners who've upgraded to the smarter way to run their business
business.getStarted.title: Get Started with EzyMart POS – Fast and Easy
business.getStarted.subtitle: Getting started with EzyMart POS is fast and effortless. Whether you're running a grocery store or a boutique, our process is designed to get your business up and running within 2 days. No tech skills needed!
business.getStarted.steps.request.title: Request System
business.getStarted.steps.request.descri: Just submit your basic details through our website or contact us. No hassle, just a few clicks.
business.getStarted.steps.contact.title: We'll Reach Out
business.getStarted.steps.contact.descri: Our team will contact you to confirm your business details then guide to you in everything and with in 2 days come to visit you business and integrate your system.
business.getStarted.steps.setup.title: Work with EzyMart POS
business.getStarted.steps.setup.descript: Once your setup is complete, you'll receive the software and admin login details, and your business is ready to go.
business.simplePricing.title: Simple Pricing, No Surprises
business.simplePricing.subtitle: We believe in fair, transparent pricing that works for small and medium businesses. Choose a plan that fits your budget no hidden fees, no long term commitments, just real value.

customers.hero.title: Anything, Anywhere
customers.hero.description: EzyMart makes shopping easier than ever. Search for products near you, discover local shops, save time, and enjoy a smooth, stress-free shopping experience all through one smart app.
customers.whyUse.title: Why Use EzyMart App?
customers.whyUse.subtitle: IF you want to save you time and money when its comes to shoping this is the best option for you.
customers.whyUse.features.heading: Benefits
customers.whyUse.features.description: Transform your shopping experience in Sri Lanka with EzyMart. Discover local stores, find products instantly, and enjoy seamless shopping - all from your smartphone.
customers.whyUse.feature1.title: Find Nearby Shops
customers.whyUse.feature1.description: Locate stores around you instantly with our smart location-based search.
customers.whyUse.feature2.title: Easy Shopping
customers.whyUse.feature2.description: Browse thousands of products from local merchants with just a few taps.
customers.whyUse.feature3.title: Save Time
customers.whyUse.feature3.description: Quick ordering and fast delivery to make your shopping experience effortless.
customers.whyUse.feature4.title: Save Money
customers.whyUse.feature4.description: By  reducing unwanted trips you can directly got to the store and buy what ever you.
customers.benefits.title: Make Life Easier with EzyMart
customers.benefits.description: Shopping doesn't have to be stressful. With EzyMart, you can find what you need, when you need it, all while saving time, energy, and money.
customers.benefits.feature1.title: Find Nearby Stores Instantly
customers.benefits.feature1.description: Quickly discover the closest stores around you with real-time location tracking—no more wandering or guessing.
customers.benefits.feature2.title: Search Products with Ease
customers.benefits.feature2.description: Easily search and filter products by name, brand, or category to find exactly what you need in seconds.
customers.benefits.feature4.title: Save Time & Money
customers.benefits.feature4.description: Plan your shopping efficiently with detailed store information, reducing unnecessary trips and long waits.
customers.benefits.feature5.title: Stress Free Shopping Experience
customers.benefits.feature5.description: Say goodbye to the frustration of endless searching. EzyMart helps you shop confidently and hassle-free, anytime and anywhere.
customers.faq.title: Got Questions?
customers.faq.description: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our services. Can't find what you're looking for? We're here to help!
customers.faq.cta.title: Still have Questions?
